Excellent!!!  I missed your previous posts about its designs.  I'd be really disappointed if I walked into my neighbors home and discovered I was back at my own home.  Do you plan to have a vegetarian shoppe; how about a garden.  I'm going to need some land to put my vegetable garden and grow some fruit trees.  I'm going to have to sound proof walls in my home also; don't want to disturb neighbors with loud instruments.

-Wyzwurd

Posts.EditableText:
[quote:2a0r4lpo]Stop posting useless car-wash in my threads[/quote:2a0r4lpo]

With all due respect, I do believe that threads should be washed with a clothes washer, not a car-washer.  Speaking of cars: please consider pollution levels in Pixel Town.  I like the name: [i:2a0r4lpo]Pixel Town[/i:2a0r4lpo].  Maybe there can be a shopping mall called I-Plex.  Or a pollutionless vehicle called the Pixel Excel?  Or Pixel Excel XL (the model with all the options).  Just, please, don't build a prison or a brothel or a striptease club.  Or have child molestors, rapists, serial killers, animal fornicators, homosexuals, or any other evil form of life roaming the streets of Pixel Town.  I'd hate to be depressed there too.  And as for plants go: maybe daisies should be excluded.

I'm not that experienced in ASL.  Me and Elex will be working on a game together.  The design guide at the moment is 7 pages long and still incomplete (I will be formatting certain parts of the document to reduce page amount though).

I'm working the NevetsWeb Network at the moment, which will soon be a network of websites ran by myself.  Before I can link the network together, all the communities have to be up and running with content.
